carousel1.description: The carousel at Tilden Park.  Felix and Milo both prefer a quiet ride in coach, versus riding the horses.
carousel1.title: Carousel 1

carousel2.description: We went with Jules, his sister Simone and his mom Heather. This was Simone's firt carousel ride ever. She handled it like a champ.
carousel2.title: Carousel 2

felix.description: Felix has been extra happy and delightful lately. It seems to date from the start of swim classes at his school. His success at the pool is giving his confidence a big boost.
felix.title: Felix

fourth1.description: We hosted a 4th of July BBQ for Dean's 4 coworkers and their families.
fourth1.title: Fourth 1

fourth2.description: <u>Left to right</u>: Ed, George, Moses, Giles and Grant.
fourth2.title: Fourth 2

fourth3.description: Ed and Mary brought a cake to toast PostApp on its road to success.
fourth3.title: Fourth 3

fourth4.description: George has 2 children: Owen (18 months) and Isabelle (5 1/2). Isabelle and Felix hit it off.
fourth4.title: Fourth 4

lakeanza1.description: Julie joined us for a soak at Lake Anza.
lakeanza1.title: Lakeanza 1

lakeanza2.description: Oh. My. God. You saw a shark THAT big?!?!
lakeanza2.title: Lakeanza 2

pool1.description: Now that Felix is into swimming, we're exploring Berkeley's swimming pools.  This is Strawberry Canyon Recreation Center.
pool1.title: Pool 1

pool2.description: No photo to prove it, but Felix really did put his entire head under water, to our amazement and enthusiastic cheers.
pool2.title: Pool 2

pool3.description: Strawberrry Canyon has a nice little wading pool for the youngest set.
pool3.title: Pool 3

sofia1.description: Sofia spent the night. Once again, she and Felix decided to get married.
sofia1.title: Sofia 1

sofia2.description: Having Sofia over is less work than just having the boys.  Sofia and Felix played nicely in Felix's room for hours, only coming out for food, or for a minister to witness the renewal of their vows.
sofia2.title: Sofia 2

supercook.description: Felix is Super Cook, carrying his many cooking ustensils everywhere he goes.
supercook.title: Supercook

description:
Happy 4th of July!

Milo saw his first firework show. He was very scared at first, burying his face in Dean's shoulder. However, after a few minutes, he got very excited, chanting "boom! boom!" and gesturing wildly.
title: July 5
